about.page_header.title: About the Area
about.page_header.subtitle: Ski Area Kunčice is among the areas with the longest history in the Králický Sněžník. Every year it welcomes thousands of skiers, cross-country skiers, freestylers, and snowboarders. You will love skiing without queues. Come and see.
about.hero.title: About Ski Area Kunčice
about.hero.description:
Ski Area Kunčice is located at the foot of the Králický Sněžník massif, 3 km past the village of Staré Město pod Sněžníkem, at an altitude of 600 to 800 meters.
Operating hours of the chairlift and lifts: 8:30 - 16:00.
about.main_content.title: Modern ski area at the foot of Králický Sněžník
about.main_content.p1: You can enjoy up to 4.5 km of perfectly groomed slopes. Individual runs range from 600 to 1,000 meters. Wide, uncrowded blue and red runs dominate, suitable for both beginners and advanced skiers.
about.main_content.p2: A four-seat chairlift, two lifts, and a contactless check-in system ensure fast and comfortable skiing without long waits. For children, we have a kids’ lift, a kids’ corner, and a playground with a rope pyramid, swings, slides, and a trampoline.
about.main_content.p3: You can park free of charge in a paved parking lot right at the base stations of the chairlift and lifts.
about.main_content.p4: Cross-country skiers won’t miss out either, as there is a ski track at the top of the Triangl lift that takes you to Králický Sněžník, Paprsek, or even to Staré Město.
about.main_content.p5: We aim to satisfy customers who prefer peace, comfort, and space over the hustle and bustle of high-capacity resorts, as well as families with children.
about.services.s1.title: Skiing without queues
about.services.s1.description: We can handle up to 4,200 skiers per hour. No waiting, just skiing. You’ll make the most of your skipass!
about.services.s2.title: Ski school for the little ones too
about.services.s2.description: Snowboarders and the youngest skiers can learn in our ski school on a special kids’ lift.
about.services.s3.title: Ski rental
about.services.s3.description: Don’t have your own skis? No problem — we will lend you skis, cross-country skis, or a snowboard, adjusted exactly for you.
about.services.s4.title: Powerful snowmaking
about.services.s4.description: We start the season among the first. Thanks to a powerful snowmaking system, our ski season lasts over 3 months.
about.services.s5.title: Service Center
about.services.s5.description: A modern service center for skiers and caravaners — refreshments, ski storage, toilets, showers, warm seating, kids’ corner, sunny terrace, changing rooms, and facilities for caravaners.
about.services.s6.title: Accommodation in Kunčice
about.services.s6.description: We will arrange accommodation just a few steps from the slopes. We cooperate with guesthouses and hotels in Kunčice.
about.restaurant.title: Restaurants and refreshments
about.restaurant.p1: Hospoda U Rumařů, the buffet at Hájovna or Skibar Kulaťák offer a sunny terrace, plenty of seating, and most importantly, something delicious to keep your energy up!
about.restaurant.p2: Our ski area has two starting points, Triangl and Hájovna. At each of them, you can use free paved, maintained parking lots. In the Hájovna area, we have newly opened a service center. During the ski season, you can rent skis, have refreshments at the adjacent buffet with a wide range of meals and drinks, rest in warmth or on a sunny terrace, plan ski or snowboard lessons.
about.cta.title: I WANT TO STAY IN KUNČICE
about.cta.p1: Our goal is to continually improve the services we provide, and your satisfaction is our top priority. If you want to praise us or have any remarks or suggestions regarding the services of the ski area, please share them through the contact form at the end of the page.
about.cta.p3: Explore Ski Area Kunčice and come visit us as soon as possible!
accommodation.index.page_header.title: Accommodation
accommodation.index.page_header.subtitle: We cooperate with the owners of guest houses and cottages in Kunčice, so we can find the most suitable accommodation for you. Whether there are just two of you, or a whole expedition!
accommodation.show.page_header.title: Accommodation details

call_to_action_scholl.title: Ski Courses for Schools
call_to_action_scholl.subtitle: We will ensure complete organization of your school ski courses. Focus on teaching – we will take care of accommodation, meals, instructors and transport. Go to the mountains without a single worry.

cross_country_skiing.page_header.title: Cross-country skiing
cross_country_skiing.content: In the Králický Sněžník area, under good conditions, 60 km of well-marked cross-country trails for classic and skating are groomed. The trail maintenance is provided by the town of Staré Město pod Sněžníkem. The longest trail continues to the Orlické Mountains. Above the Kunčice ski area, there is a groomed trail, take the ride to the top on our comfortable four-seat chairlift.

events.index.page_header.subtitle: Overview of all our events and activities

footer.description: A modern ski area in the heart of the Moravian-Silesian Beskids. We offer quality slopes, professional services and unforgettable experiences.
footer.services.title: Services
footer.about.title: About the area
footer.contact.title: Contact
hero.winter.title: Mountains where you can hear silence
hero.winter.subtitle: Where winter makes sense — Kunčice under Králický Sněžník.
hero.summer.title: Summer activities for the whole family
hero.summer.subtitle: Discover the beauty of Jeseníky also in summer
hero_webcam.title: Webcam
hero_webcam.description: View of the slopes and area
home_restaurant_section.title: Restaurant & Bar
home_restaurant_section.restaurant_descr: During a day spent on the slopes, you will need to regain strength and refresh yourself sufficiently. Take advantage of one of our gastro facilities, which you have right at the slopes in the Kunčice ski area!
home_service_list.winter.s1.title: Ski School
home_service_list.winter.s1.description: Trained instructors will teach skiing even to the biggest sports anti-talents. We have a modern kids’ lift and safe slope
home_service_list.winter.s2.title: Accommodation
home_service_list.winter.s2.description: We cooperate with hotel and guesthouse owners in Kunčice. Contact us and we will arrange the best accommodation for you.
home_service_list.winter.s3.title: Restaurant
home_service_list.winter.s3.description: Strengthen yourself during all-day skiing at Hospoda U Rumařů or use Skibar Kulaťák under the exit station of the chairlift.
home_service_list.winter.s4.title: Ski Rental
home_service_list.winter.s4.description: Rent a complete set or part for skiing and freestyle. If you want to buy skis right away, we will choose the best ones with you.
home_service_list.winter.s5.title: Service Center, Caravans
home_service_list.winter.s5.description: In the Service Center you will find toilets, showers, warm seating, kids’ corner, changing rooms and facilities for caravaners. Just a few steps from the Center there are reserved spaces for caravans with electrical connections.
home_service_list.summer.s1.title: TRIPS TIPS
home_service_list.summer.s1.description: We have selected a few tips for trips in the nearby and a bit more distant surroundings. Get to know beautiful monuments, untamed nature, mountain streams and springs...
home_service_list.summer.s2.title: BIKE TRIPS
home_service_list.summer.s2.description: Get to know the beauty of Kunčice and Staroměstsko from a slightly different perspective - from the saddle of a mountain bike. The nature of Králický Sněžník attracts every year with its maintained cycle paths.
home_service_list.summer.s3.title: Accommodation
home_service_list.summer.s3.description: We cooperate with hotel and guesthouse owners in Kunčice. Contact us and we will arrange the best accommodation for you.
home_service_list.summer.s4.title: AGROTURISM - HORSES
home_service_list.summer.s4.description: Thanks to agrotourism, you can experience what you would not normally experience - get closer to nature and animals. A horse ride is a pleasant addition to a family vacation.
home_service_list.summer.s5.title: Restaurant and refreshments
home_service_list.summer.s5.description: Strengthen yourself during all-day trips at Hospoda U Rumařů or enjoy refreshments with a view of the beautiful landscape of Králický Sněžník.
kalendar_akci.title: Event Calendar
kalendar_akci.subtitle: All our upcoming events and activities
kids_paradise.page_header.title: Kids Snowpark
kids_paradise.page_header.subtitle: Kids Paradise in the Hájovna area
kids_paradise.hero.title: Kids Paradise in the Hájovna area
kids_paradise.hero.subtitle: Safe and fun environment for your children. Kids rope tow with lots of animal figures and slides, rope pyramid, swings, slides, trampoline and also a play corner in the warm Service Center.
kids_paradise.features.f1.title: Kids rope tow
kids_paradise.features.f1.description: With lots of animal figures and slides for safe fun
kids_paradise.features.f2.title: Rope pyramid
kids_paradise.features.f3.title: Swings and slides
kids_paradise.features.f3.description: Classic games for all age categories
kids_paradise.features.f4.title: Trampoline
kids_paradise.features.f4.description: Jumping and fun for active children
kids_paradise.features.f5.title: Play corner
kids_paradise.features.f5.description: In the warmth of the Service Center for cold days
kids_paradise.features.f6.title: Refreshments
kids_paradise.features.f6.description: Fries, hot dogs in buns, drinks, wafers and other treats
kids_paradise.info.title: Safe environment for your children
kids_paradise.info.description: All attractions are regularly checked and maintained in a safe condition. Our instructors supervise the safety of children and are ready to help whenever needed. Parents can watch their children from close proximity or relax in the adjacent restaurants.
kids_paradise.cta.title: Bring your children to Kids Paradise!
kids_paradise.cta.subtitle: While you enjoy skiing, your children have a great time in a safe environment with professional supervision.

partners_section.title: Area Partners
partners_section.subtitle: We cooperate with leading companies in the field
philosophy_section.p1: Morning coffee, freshly groomed slope, and quiet all around. That’s how days begin here in Kunčice. At a resort at the foot of Králický Sněžník, where nature, space, and the calm rhythm of the mountains take the lead. Sunlit slopes, clean air, and the natural atmosphere of the Jeseníky create a place with its own rhythm — one that anyone seeking true winter comfort will love.
philosophy_section.p2: We are the ideal choice for active, recreational, and beginner skiers, for families with children, and for school courses. For those who want to ski without stress and have everything in one place. Wide, safe, and clear runs with a gentle slope give beginners confidence, while experienced skiers appreciate the space for carved turns, the quality of grooming, and all-day sun exposure.
philosophy_section.p3: A four-seat chairlift, two lifts, a kids’ conveyor belt, rope lift, ski school, rental, service, and a cozy restaurant — everything is concentrated at the base station, so you can focus on time together on the snow. The Kunčice area lies 3 km past Staré Město pod Sněžníkem at an altitude of 600–800 m, in a picturesque valley in typical Jeseníky scenery. There is also a connection to well-known cross-country trails towards Paprsek and Králický Sněžník.
philosophy_section.p4: Kunčice is a place where winter makes sense and where you will enjoy truly comfortable skiing.

pricing.important_info.i1.p3: Remaining points can be used for the last ride on the chairlift and lifts.
pricing.important_info.i2.p1: Children's fare applies to children from 7 to 12 years and seniors from 65 years

restaurant.page_header.title: Restaurant
restaurant.page_header.subtitle: Dining in the area
restaurant.downloads.title: Menus to download
restaurant.intro.title: Restaurants and refreshments at Ski Area Kunčice
restaurant.intro.p1: During a day on the slope you will need to refuel and refresh. Use some of our gastronomy facilities located right by the slopes in the Kunčice ski area.
restaurant.rumaru.title: Hospoda u Rumařů
restaurant.rumaru.p1: Offers 100 seats in a pleasant wood-paneled interior with views of the slopes and a sunny terrace. You’ll find it right at the base station of the cableway.
restaurant.rumaru.menu.title: On the menu you will find:
restaurant.rumaru.menu.i1: Soups, set meals, and short-order dishes
restaurant.rumaru.menu.i2: Specialties from a classic smokehouse and grill
restaurant.rumaru.menu.i3: Treats for children: pancakes, blueberry dumplings, hot dogs, fries, langoš, corn, and more
restaurant.rumaru.menu.i4: A wide selection of hot and cold alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks
restaurant.rumaru.p2: From time to time you can enjoy a grilled piglet on the terrace.
restaurant.hajovna.title: Restaurant at the Hájovna lift
restaurant.hajovna.p1: Dining and refreshments at Hájovna are provided by a full-service restaurant with 50 seats.
restaurant.hajovna.p2: In good weather, you will enjoy a sunny terrace with wind protection and views of the mountain ridges, playground, and kids’ lift.
restaurant.kulatak.title: Skibar Kulaťák
restaurant.kulatak.p1: A panoramic skibar located about 100 meters below the top station of the chairlift. It offers hot and cold, alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks and a light snack.
restaurant.kulatak.p2: In favorable weather, you can look forward to unforgettable views of the surrounding panoramas of our beautiful mountains.
restaurant.hours.title: Opening hours
restaurant.hours.rumaru.title: Hospoda U Rumařů
restaurant.hours.hajovna.title: Restaurant at Hájovna
restaurant.hours.kulatak.title: Skibar Kulaťák
restaurant.facilities.title: Heated changing rooms and toilets
restaurant.facilities.p1: A ski storage and heated changing room are really practical in our ski area. You can change in warmth and store valuables in a lockable locker. You can also warm up by the heating.
restaurant.facilities.p2: Well-functioning facilities are complemented by heated and maintained toilets with hot water. They are accessible at the base station of the Triangl chairlift and the Hájovna lift, and you can reach them even on skis, as you don’t need to go up any stairs.
ski_bus.page_header.title: Skibus
ski_bus.page_header.subtitle: Transport to the area
ski_bus.hero.title: Skibus - Transport to the area
ski_bus.hero.subtitle: Comfortable and safe transport directly to the slopes. Ideal solution for groups and families who want to take advantage of all the benefits of skiing without worries about parking.
ski_bus.status.title: Temporarily out of service
ski_bus.status.subtitle: The skibus service is currently suspended. Follow our website for current information about resuming operations.

ski_bus.service_description.s1.title: Reservation
ski_bus.service_description.s1.subtitle: Contact us in advance to reserve the skibus for your group.
ski_bus.service_description.s2.title: Pickup
ski_bus.service_description.s2.subtitle: We will pick you up directly at your accommodation in the Kunčice area.
ski_bus.service_description.s3.title: Transport
ski_bus.service_description.s3.subtitle: Comfortable transport directly to the base stations of the chairlift and lifts.
ski_bus.service_description.s4.title: Return
ski_bus.service_description.s4.subtitle: After skiing, we will transport you back to your accommodation.
ski_bus.benefits.b1.title: For groups
ski_bus.benefits.b1.subtitle: Ideal for groups of 10 or more people
ski_bus.benefits.b2.title: Safe transport
ski_bus.benefits.b2.subtitle: Experienced drivers and modern vehicles
ski_bus.benefits.b3.title: Time saving
ski_bus.benefits.b3.subtitle: No searching for parking at the area
ski_bus.cta.title: Interested in skibus?
ski_bus.cta.subtitle: Contact us for more information and reservation. We will be happy to help you organize transport for your group.
ski_rental.page_header.title: Ski and Snowboard Rental
ski_rental.page_header.subtitle: Choose your complete equipment in our ski and snowboard rental. Our staff will gladly select the most suitable equipment tailored to you. We will also adjust everything, wax it and prepare it for the slope.
ski_rental.main_content.title: Professional service and preparation
ski_rental.main_content.s1.title: Personal approach
ski_rental.main_content.s1.subtitle: Our staff will gladly select the most suitable equipment tailored to your needs.
ski_rental.main_content.s2.title: Professional preparation
ski_rental.main_content.s2.subtitle: We will also adjust everything, wax it and prepare it for the slope for optimal performance.
ski_rental.main_content.s3.title: Group reservations
ski_rental.main_content.s3.subtitle: If you need to rent a larger amount of equipment, call us at +420 724 837 139.
ski_rental.main_content.s4.title: Email contact
ski_rental.main_content.s4.subtitle: Or write to us at kuncice@newmanschool.cz. We will prepare skis and snowboards for ski training as well.

tourist_services_center.hero.title: Tourist and Caravan Service Center
tourist_services_center.hero.p1: The service center is located at the Hájovna lift station. It provides complete sanitary facilities including showers, a restaurant, a sunny terrace with wind protection overlooking the children’s playground and kids’ lift, and a children’s corner.
tourist_services_center.hero.p2: Caravaners can use the above-mentioned sanitary facilities even outside the regular operating hours of the center.
tourist_services_center.facilities.title: Facilities and equipment
tourist_services_center.facilities.i2: Restaurant directly in the Service Center
tourist_services_center.facilities.i3: Sunny terrace with wind protection overlooking the children’s playground and kids’ lift
tourist_services_center.caravan.title: Caravan parking and connections
tourist_services_center.caravan.p1: In front of the Service Center there are designated parking spaces with 16 electricity connections for caravans.
Price list for parking at an electrical connection
tourist_services_center.operating_info.i: Keys to sanitary facilities and showers available from 8:30 to 16:00 at the area cash desk
Electricity based on consumption 10 CZK / kW
tourist_services_center.reservation.p1: Reserve a caravan parking space by email or phone.
tourist_services_center.courses_faciliti: Another nice service is heated changing rooms with lockable lockers and ski storage for ski courses at the lift stations.
tourist_services_center.available_servic: Rental of ski and snowboard equipment
